name: Cultivate Partners
goal: Cultivate Partners delivers high impact international policy advocacy, partnerships and grant development initiatives for the NGO, research, private and public sector.
interests: Budget, Business and Industry, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, External Relations, General and Institutional Affairs, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives:
EU regional policy
EU trade policy
EU social investment policy
EU Research and Innovation policy
